item.description:
Host: Claire P.
RAIN CANCELS THIS EVENT!

Rescheduling this event for March 3. Hope to see you then!

 

Rescheduling this event for March 3. Hope to see you then! Weather permitting, I think it would be fun to go hiking or snow shoeing on the Peabody Mill Environmental Trail in Amherst NH. Please know that my intent is to enjoy the view of the area, and to chat along the way. This event is meant more to have fun than to get a workout. I plan on hiking for approximately two hours, while taking many small breaks along the way.
We will meet at 2:00pm sharp, at the Brook Rd, entrance. Please follow these directions: From the Nashua area, take Route 101 to Horace Greeley Rd, cross small stream, turn left onto Brook Rd. Go all the way to the end (2 ½ mi), pavement turns to dirt for the last ¾ miles. Look for a white Toyota or a Meetup sign.
Please remember to bring plenty of fluids and to dress in layers for comfort.
This event is at no cost! I hope to see you there!
Please RSVP or call my cell @ 603-247-0897 Do not RSVP no.
Liability Release - AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and her heirs, and all members and participants of this Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup. All meetup activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Participation in these activities is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.

group.name: Meeting & Greeting in So. NH & the Merrimack Valley :)

item.name: Hiking or snowshoeing Peabody Mills Amherst
